testcase.name: getting locations for a player returns two locations if a player has bought two locations()
getting balance for a new player added with £500 to the GameLedger gives £500()
getting locations for a player returns a single location with supermarket if a player has bout a location and developed it()
ownedLocation returns an empty list when nothing has been added to the GameLedger()
ownedLocations returns two owned locations when two locations have been added to GameLedger()
ownedLocations returns a single owned location when one has been added to GameLEdger()
getting locations for a player returns no locations if the same property has been subsequently bought by another player()
getting locations for a player returns a single undeveloped location if a player has only one undeveloeprd location()
getting balance for a player with £200 credit and £150 debt has £50 credit in total()
getting balance for a player with no credit pays rent of 200()
get balance for a player not on GameLedger returns zero()
getting locations for a player returns an empty list if a player hasnt bought any()
ownedLocations returns a single owned location with correct building when one location has been added to GameLEdger and then built on()
ownedLocations returns an empty list when transactions containing no location information have been added to the GameLedger()()
